Translation.Text: (intransitive) To get to, reach, arrive at/in (a place).
Translation.HTML: (intransitive) To get to, reach, arrive at/in (a place).

Example.Translation: How do I get to the airport?

Example.Text: En päässyt aivan huipulle, koska puhkesi lumimyrsky.
Example.Translation: I didn't quite reach the summit, because a snowstorm broke out.
